movie.title: The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc
movie.plot: In 1429 a teenage girl from a remote French village stood before her King with a message she claimed came from God; that she would defeat the world's greatest army and liberate her country from its political and religious turmoil. Following her mission to reclaim god's diminished kingdom - through her amazing victories until her violent and untimely death.

events.title: Joan of Arc is wounded by the English at Orléans
the English forces agree to retreat from Orléans
Joan of Arc is burned at the stake
